moves.name: Astonish
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target Flinches.

moves.name: Confuse Ray
moves.effect: The target is Confused.

moves.name: Curse
moves.effect: If the user is a Ghost-type, they lose half their max HP and the target is Cursed, losing 1/4 of its max HP each turn. If the user is not a Ghost-type, it lowers the user's Dexterity by 1 and raises its Strength and Vitality by 1.

moves.name: Destiny Bond
moves.effect: If the user is knocked out by an attack this round, the attacker also faints.

moves.name: Dream Eater
moves.effect: This move only works on a sleeping target. The user regains HP equal to half the damage dealt.

moves.name: Grudge
moves.effect: If the user is knocked out by an attack this round, the move that knocked it out loses all its Power Points.

moves.name: Hex
moves.effect: If the target has a status condition, this move's damage is doubled.

moves.name: Lick
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target is Paralyzed.

moves.name: Mean Look
moves.effect: The target cannot switch out or flee for the rest of the scene.

moves.name: Memento
moves.effect: The user faints, but the target's Strength and Special are lowered by 2.

moves.name: Night Shade
moves.effect: Deals damage equal to the user's Rank multiplied by 5.

moves.name: Nightmare
moves.effect: A sleeping target loses 1/4 of its max HP at the end of each turn.

moves.name: Ominous Wind
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 6, all of the user's stats are raised by 1.

moves.name: Pain Split
moves.effect: The user and the target's current HP are added together and then split evenly between them.

moves.name: Phantom Force
moves.effect: The user vanishes for one turn, becoming untargetable. It attacks on the second turn. This move bypasses Protect and Detect.

moves.name: Shadow Ball
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target's Insight is lowered by 1.

moves.name: Shadow Claw
moves.effect: High critical hit ratio.

moves.name: Shadow Punch
moves.effect: This move cannot miss.

moves.name: Shadow Sneak
moves.effect: This move has Priority.

moves.name: Spite
moves.effect: The target's last used move loses 1d4 Power Points.

moves.name: Trick-or-Treat
moves.effect: Adds the Ghost type to the target's current typing for the rest of the scene.
